title: Toni the Superhero
description: Meet Toni the Superhero! Toni is a little boy with extraordinary powers, but he likes to do ordinary things too! Find out what Toni likes to do when heâ€™s not busy saving the world. This is the first book in a series of Toni the Superhero books geared towards teaching children to read. The book is targeted towards children ages 0 to 4.
author: R.D. Base
